name: Simpl
description:
Hello! and Welcome to Simpl.

Simpl is a really fun random-generating platformer that can help you relax. If you are ever bored, then download Simpl and give it a shot!

Many of the instructions are in game, but some aren't implemented yet. Remember, this game is still a work in progress. There is also one feature that is in the game and working but not in the "How to play" section. You can use "i" and "d" keys to increase and decrease the volume. 

And with that, enjoy the game!
